import Theme from '../../components/Theme';
import { Label } from 'fannypack/Label';

# Label

## Import

```jsx
import { Label } from 'fannypack'
```

## Usage

`<Label>` renders a `<label>` by default with basic reset styling.

```jsx-live
<Label>Hello world</Label>
This is me
```

They can also be linked with any type of field, like `<Input>`.

```jsx-live
<Label htmlFor="name" marginBottom="minor-2">Your name</Label>
<Input id="name" />
```

## Theming

<Theme
  component={Label}
  overrides={[
    'Label.css.root'
  ]}>
  Hello world
</Theme>
